text.p: If the columns of [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] form an orthonormal basis of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline], then [mathjaxinline]\langle Av, w\rangle = \langle v, Aw \rangle[/mathjaxinline] for all [mathjaxinline]v,w\in \mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline].

font.p: That is not what we mean when we say [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] preserves inner products! Rather, we mean that [mathjaxinline]\langle Av,Aw\rangle = \langle v,w\rangle[/mathjaxinline] for all [mathjaxinline]v,w\in \mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline].
